rows.label: qev026002_MSG0001
rows.name:
Welcome to to the Ma-non ship! We think you'll join
the rest of space in agreeing it offers the very finest
of amenities, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0002
rows.name:
How did you like the ride here? Our warp device packs
a kick, yes? That's classic Ma-non technology there.
From ether to warp drives, we have it all, don't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0003
rows.name:
But maybe I should continue from where I left off
earlier?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0004
rows.name:
During the time it took to move here after establishing
our present friendship with your people, we Ma-non
created a number of items to sell, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0005
rows.name:
They're based on thorough market research,
and guaranteed to hit the human spot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Or that WAS the plan, right? However, the culture
barrier is harder to overcome than we thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0007
rows.name:
While the technology involved is practically primitive,
we're having an incredibly difficult time actually...
coming up with everyday products?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0008
rows.name:
From washing things in diluted chemicals to slathering
paint on your faces, your human needs are...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well, they're incredibly strange, aren't they?
Inscrutable? Beyond the grasp of all logic, even?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0010
rows.name: Literally impossible to fathom, perhaps? Yes. That's it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0011
rows.name:
So we decided to forget about everyday products and
make weapons instead, since the needs of most species
are essentially the same in that area, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0012
rows.name: They want power, yes? Convenience. Deluxe-ness?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0013
rows.name:
And Ma-non weapons have all that and more, okay?
So I'm very very certain humans will agree to buy so
so so many! But but but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0014
rows.name:
Well, the cultural barrier IS pretty high, isn't it?
I'm worried that humans might not understand how
amazing these weapons really are, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0015
rows.name:
So so so...
This is where the favor part comes in, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0016
rows.name:
I want you to try some of the weapons we made here
in the field, and and then go tell all the other humans
how amazing they are, okay? Word of mouth, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'll set you up with one of our latest models to get you
started, if that's all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0018
rows.name:
Take it and go hunt some indigens called quick evellos,
okay? Seven or so should be enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oh, and the more wild and flamboyantly you can fight,
the better advertisement it is likely to make.
We might even have humans lining up out the door?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0020
rows.name:
So yes. All right. Candid & Credible's future is in your
hands, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0021
rows.name:
For starters, take our latest model of weapon and go
defeat seven or so quick evellos with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh, and the more wild and flamboyantly you can fight,
the better advertisement it is likely to make.
We might even have humans lining up out the door?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0023
rows.name:
So yes. All right. Candid & Credible's future is in your
hands, you understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0024
rows.name:
Er, welcome! How did the advertising go?
Was the weapon shockingly effective, hopefully?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0025
rows.name:
Well, we've already had customers inquiring about it!
So why don't you return it to me now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0026
rows.name:
While you were out there advertising, we were in here
inventing new equipment. So so so here you go, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0027
rows.name:
Much much more kick in this one, you see? Very very
powerful. So please go out there and share it with the
world, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0028
rows.name:
...Though I worry that just using it against any old
indigen you run across could muddle the message a
little bit, couldn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0029
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0030
rows.name:
What sounds more impressiveâ€”defeating one SUPER
strong enemy or or a whole bunch of regular enemies?
Which makes for better advertising then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_JNK0010
rows.name: Strong[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that defeating one tough enemy is more impressive.

rows.label: qev026002_JNK0020
rows.name: Many[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_SEL0021
rows.name:
Claim that defeating a swarm of enemies
would make for better advertising.

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0031
rows.name:
Right, we want an impact, don't we? So taking down
an infamous threat will raise your status and make our
weapon an overnight sensation at the same time, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0032
rows.name:
Which means we'll need you to aim as high as
possible when picking your target, won't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0033
rows.name:
Something like a welkin auravis, maybe? Or even two?
Yes. Two would be better than one, wouldn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0034
rows.name:
One has been sighted nearby in Primordia, and its
parameters are a good match with those we used in
the design process. So it's pretty much...perfect?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0035
rows.name:
If things go well and the advertising yields results,
we can call this model the Auravinerator, perhaps?
Or or or the Auraviscerator?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0036
rows.name:
Very good, yes? Best of luck in slaying two of those
welkin auravises with the latest and greatest Candid &
Credible tech, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0037
rows.name:
Ah, yes! Carving through a pack of foes without even
bothering to turn around and watch them fall, right?
It will be a difficult task for sure, won't it...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0038
rows.name:
But but but the advertising effect will be proportionately
higher, won't it now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0039
rows.name:
All right, let's say... Hmm, how does tracking down 99
iron femina suids sound? Because isn't 99 such an
exciting number?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0040
rows.name:
...Ah, but wait. Now that I think on it, even just
keeping track of that many kills sounds like a pain,
doesn't it? Er, for me, right? So, um, yes. Never mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0041
rows.name: Let's just say 10 and call it a day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0042
rows.name:
As long as the ad copy can read "slay 10 or more in
mere seconds," we're in the clear, yes?
Er, legally speaking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0043
rows.name:
Very good, yes? Best of luck taking down 10 iron
femina suids with the latest and greatest Candid &
Credible tech, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0044
rows.name:
We're in talks with our head office regarding
production schedules for mass-producing that last
weapon, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0045
rows.name:
It's located with the arms manufacturers over in the
administrative district. Would you mind maybe
dropping in and giving your report?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0046
rows.name:
Ah, welcome back. Advertising efforts going well,
I hope? Not too stunned by the power of our
weapon to use it effectively, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0047
rows.name:
We've had customers drop in asking about it already.
So why don't you go ahead and hand that back to me
so we can continue?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026002_MSG0048
rows.name:
Ah, I'm afraid I can't take it while it's still equipped.
...Er, forgive me, yes? No offense?[ST:wait ]
